title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2021 Bitcoin Penny Dogecoin, brass ICG MS68 PLLOT 2: 2018 Bitcoin Penny "PT", platinum ICG MS69 PLLOT 3: 2016 Bitcoin Penny "DAVE", copperLOT 4: 2017 Bitcoin Penny "IRIE", copperSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0005BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTCPlease limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal placesEND TIME: NOVEMBER 11th, 2023, 14:00:00 PSTPayment due within 24 hours of auction end!!SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: bc1q0mj9njt50045qfuzewc4rut7su7cvg8nt89j3cSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 1: 0.0005Lot 2: 0.0055Nice coins, never seen a graded Bitcoinpenny that's NOT silver, gold or platinum.The gold and platinum BPs are actually so rare and unique, I am sure they are a great store of collectible value if you think about long-term hodling.
